# allowsDefaultTighteningForTruncation

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that controls whether single-line text fields tighten intercharacter spacing before truncating the text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsDefaultTighteningForTruncation: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The text field ignores this property when its value is an attributed string.

## Configuring Line Wrapping

- **lineBreakStrategy**: The strategy that the system uses to break lines when laying out multiple lines of text.
- **maximumNumberOfLines**: The maximum number of lines a wrapping text field displays before clipping or truncating the text.
